class.name: PinJoint2D
class.brief_description: A physics joint that attaches two 2D physics bodies at a single point, allowing them to freely rotate.
class.description: A physics joint that attaches two 2D physics bodies at a single point, allowing them to freely rotate. For example, a [RigidBody2D] can be attached to a [StaticBody2D] to create a pendulum or a seesaw.

members.member: The higher this value, the more the bond to the pinned partner can flex.
